dmca.title: DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Trent Stricker [mailto:trent@netscorp.net] 
Sent: Monday, August 30, 2004 1:23 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: 2night@guatehost.com
Subject: DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement

8-29-04

Recipient Information:
Theplanet.com, Lance Crosby, Esq.
C/O Copyright Agent for Notice of Claims of Copyright Infringement

DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement
re:http://laredo.new2.2night.com/home.asp?Canal=Eventos&AlbumID=11146&Titulo
=Laredo+Heat+Soccer%21%21%21&Fecha=Dom+20+de+Junio
&
http://laredo.new2.2night.com/home.asp?Canal=Eventos&AlbumID=10840&Titulo=La
redo+Heat+Soccer+%21+%21+%21&Fecha=S%E1b+12+de+Junio


Dear Lance Crosby, Esq.

I, Trent Stricker, certify under penalty of perjury, that I am an agent
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property
rights.

I have a good faith belief that the items or materials listed below are not
authorized by law for use by the above named domain name owner or their
agents and therefore infringes the copyright owner's rights. I hereby demand
that you act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or
items claimed to be infringing. 

My contact information is as follows:

Trent Stricker Photography
Trent Stricker, Owner
trent@netscorp.net
956-324-1270
410 Rienda
Laredo, Tx. 78045


Allegedly Infringing items or materials: 

Photographs of the Laredo Heat Soccer Team.

Infringing material that I demand be disabled or removed in consideration of
the above: 

All photographs listing at the following URL's

http://laredo.new2.2night.com/home.asp?Canal=Eventos&AlbumID=11146&Titulo=La
redo+Heat+Soccer%21%21%21&Fecha=Dom+20+de+Junio
http://laredo.new2.2night.com/home.asp?Canal=Eventos&AlbumID=10840&Titulo=La
redo+Heat+Soccer+%21+%21+%21&Fecha=S%E1b+12+de+Junio



Location of ORIGINAL WORKS:
www.laredosportsphotos.com

My actual or electronic signature follows: 
Trent Stricker
